// Sieve of Eratosthenes .....
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    
    long long int n1,i,k;int temp=0;
    long long int n,sum=0;
    cin>>n;
    if(n<2)cout<<temp;
    vector<bool>a(n+1,1);          // initial assumption : all are prime ...
    a[0]=0;
    a[1]=0;
    n1=(int)sqrt(n);
    for(i=2;i<=n1;i++)
    {
                      for(k=i;k<=n/i;k++)
                      {
                                         a[i*k]=0;
                      }
    }
    for(i=2;i<n+1;i++)
    if(a[i]==1)sum+=i;
    cout<<sum;  
}
